item.title: Jarmels - A Little Bit Of Soap
item.description:
A little bit of soap
will wash away
Your lipstick
on my face
But a little
bit of soap
Will never
never never ever erase
The pain in my heart
and my eyes
As I go through
the lonely years
A little bit of soap
will never wash
Away my tears
a little bit of soap
Will wash away
your powder
From my chin
a little bit of soap
Will never
never never ever begin
To take away the hurt
that I feel
As I go through
the lonely years
A little bit of soap
will never wash
Away my tears
have you heard
When love begins
to die it leaves
Someone to cry
night and day
Like a bird you left
your robin’s nest
And a just like
all the rest you
Flew away
um a little
Bit of soap
will take away
Your perfume
eventually
But a little
bit of soap
Will never wash
away the memory
Of your name
in the night
That I call through
the lonely years
A little
bit of soap
Will never wash
away my tears
I’ll never
lose the memory
Of your name
in the night
That I call through
the lonely years
A little
bit of soap
Will never wash
away my tears
Um a little
bit of soap
Will never wash
away my tears
Um it’s gonna
never never never
Uh huh
wash away my tears-
